page.title: 16Schoolboys'typical day,Rugby
page.content: {07.30}Get up shower clean teeth(Fl.) Dress in terylene trousers,polycotton shirt,nylon socks & cotton pants. Breakfast cereal+milk & cup of tea & fruit juice. {08.30}Leave for school,walking+friend. {08.55}Arrive school,school bell. {09.00-12.00}Registration &lessons e.g. Maths,English,French,Art,C.D.T.,Music or Sport,including mid-morning break. {12.00-13.15}Lunch.Meat,Veg.Gravy,Sweet {13.15-15.50}Registration then lessons with mid-afternoon break. {15.50-16.05}School ends arrive home. {16.10-17.30}Activities with friends e.g.Sports,Computing,Cinema. {17.30}Tea of Meat,Veg.etc.Pudding. {18.00-21.30}Activities with friends. {21.30}Shower,clean teeth & put on blue polycotton pyjamas. {22.00}Watch T.V. in bed till fall asleep.
